document_data.mainbody:
istfall House was an abandoned temple dedicated to Leira found in the village of Feather Falls in Featherdale in the .
Once splendid, the temple sat empty in front of Feather Falls on the River Ashaba. The interior was always damp courtesy of the mist from the waterfall. The temple contained six subterranean storage rooms, some of which connected to the Underdark.
The lower levels were home to several monsters despite efforts to clear them out.
During its prime, the temple appeared to have access to a variety of expensive wares that were transported to various Dales. The source of this wealth appeared to be from the Underdark, but it remained a mystery with whom the Leirans were trading with.
